Adventure.name: GroupHumanoid
Adventure.nodes: An armed group approaches.
Your words don't work. You are beaten and chased away.

Adventure.name: GroupBeast
Adventure.nodes: A pack of beasts approaches.
Your threats don't work. You are beaten and chased away.
You won!
You failed and beasts chase you away.

Adventure.name: GroupMythical
Adventure.nodes: A mythical creature crosses your path!
You fail. You are beaten and chased away.
You won!
You were badly beaten and forced to flee.
You convinced the creature to leave you alone!
You defeated the creature and as its soul shatters so does its body.

Adventure.name: GroupTroll
Adventure.nodes: You see trolls!
You fail. You are beaten and chased away.
The trolls abandon some goods as they leave.

Adventure.name: GroupSocialAttack
Adventure.nodes: Be it a monologue of great importance, a beautiful song, or a seductive lyric, a someone is trying to entrance you with their silver tongues.
You fail. Your mind feels muddled and your spirit cursed.

Adventure.name: GroupPhysicalDemon
Adventure.nodes: A demon is approaching you aggressively.
You fail. Your mind feels muddled and your spirit cursed.

Adventure.name: GroupUnliving
Adventure.nodes: You are assailed by the unliving!
Your threats don't work. You are beaten and chased away.

Adventure.name: ElvenChildGrowingup
Adventure.nodes:
Your elven child will not be deemed adult amongst its elven kin for many decades yet, but they have reached the time of growth.
As such, they will undergo the croppings: a coming-of-age ceremony.
But this path is never easy. You must choose what journey the young one will take before, gods willing, they may return to you as an adult.

The weaves of magic are natural to all elves, yet the path of the magic user is wrought with dark dangers, especially for an elven child raised away from their own kind. They may not return to you or their path may not lead to what you seek.
[To pursue rare classes, the child will often need a high stat in the appropriate field (exact numbers vary) like strength for warriors etc. as well as chance. Improving the luck attribute may also help in this.]

Your elven youth was clearly destined to walk the mystical path as they return to you as a mage.
The trials were tough and they are not as strong as a fully-fledged adult yet, but in time, surely, they will become great!
The child returns an elven druid. And while they are now often at odds with village life, they remain loyal to the gods and their chosen family.

Your elven youth was clearly not destined to walk the path of mage, at least not yet. But they received some training, and in all likelihood they still outrank most non-elven magic users, or that is what they tell you.

The child entered their trials but the darkness that comes with learning magic proved too strong.
The youngster falls, their skin turns grey, their veins black, and soon, madness takes their mind.
Just as you thought the child gone, they return to you, changed but no longer torn by the darkness - a shadow elf.

The trials to become a worker are often the safest, but for an elven child the call of their own kin may prove strong when they are told to perform mundane tasks.
Still, it is a worthwhile journey and should be taken with pride.

The elven youth sets out obediently to perform their trials, but they never return to you.
Many years later, you receive word that their journey took them to faraway lands and they hope to return soon, but in elven time, so it may not be in your lifetime.
The trials are successful and the elven child grows into a youth under your watchful eye.
The trials are successful and the elven child grows into a youth under your watchful eye.
The trials for a fighter are tough and dangerous. The child must prove their mantle in the wild and hold its own against stronger challengers.
The trials of the warrior proved too hard and the child perished.
The trials are successful and the elven child grows into a youth under your watchful eye.

The child does not do well in their trials. They return to you rugged and depressed, whispering of blood and rape.
They were clearly strengthened by whatever happened, but their mind and soul remain scarred.
Your elven child was due to become adult, at least by your mortal count, but it quickly became apparent they were never elven in the first place, but rather a forest creature disguised by a spell.
The child heard the call of the wild and disappeared in the forest for a time, only to return a feral.
The child becomes a forest fairy and returns home to you, changed but ever loyal.
The child becomes a vily and returns home to you, changed but ever loyal.
The child becomes an eldercone and returns home to you, changed but ever loyal.
The child returns a banished elven druid. And while they are now often at odds with village life, they remain loyal to the gods and their chosen family.
Your elven youth was clearly not destined to walk the path of a druid, at least not yet. But they received some training, and they remain devoted to a life in commune with nature.

Your elven youth was clearly destined to walk the mystical path as they return to you as a mage.
The trials were tough and they are not as strong as a fully-fledged adult yet, but in time, surely, they will become great!
The trials for a fighter are tough and dangerous. The child must prove their mantle in the wild and hold its own against stronger challengers.

Adventure.name: DwarfChildGrowingup
Adventure.nodes:
Your dwarven child is about to become an adult, at least by how mortals count the years. As such, they will undergo the croppings: a coming-of-age ceremony.
But the path is never easy. You must now choose what journey the young one will take before, gods willing, they may return to you as an adult.

You come to the dwarven town and your young one is taken in for the trials of stone and metal.
[To pursue rare classes, the child will often need a high stat in the appropriate field (exact numbers vary) like strength for warriors etc. as well as chance. Improving the luck attribute may also help in this.]
By the will of stone and metal, your dwarven child proved to be a prodigy and has become one of the youngest fully-fledged smiths, especially for one raised away from dwarven cities.
By the will of stone and metal, your dwarven child proved to be a talented labourer, far surpassing their peers.
The child decided to remain with their own kin.

The trials to become a worker are often the safest, but for a dwarven child, the call of their own kin may prove strong when they begin to mature.
Still, it is a worthwhile journey and should be taken with pride.
The dwarven child did indeed grow into a strong youth, but the call of stone and metal proved too strong to ignore, and they left you to be with their dwarven kin.
The trials are successful and the dwarven child grows into a youth under your watchful eye.
The trials are successful and the dwarven child grows into a youth under your watchful eye.
The trials for a fighter are tough and dangerous. The child must prove their mantle in the wild and hold its own against stronger challengers.
By the will of stone and metal, your dwarven child proved to be a talented warmaster.

The child does not do well in their trials. They return to you ragged and depressed, whispering of blood and rape.
They become a labourer, but even in that they remain weak.
Your dwarven child was due to become adult, at least by your mortal count, but it quickly became apparent they were never dwarven in the first place, but rather a creature of stone hidden by a spell!

The child becomes a rocker and returns home to you, changed but ever loyal.
In a few decades, it will become a rock troll.

The child becomes a lava rocker and returns home to you, changed but ever loyal.
In a few decades, it will become a lava troll.
By the will of the stone and metal, your dwarven child proved to be a prodigy and has become one of the youngest runemasters ever recorded in dwarven memory.
The trials proved too much, perhaps their bond to the non-dwarven gods interfered with the sacred rites of passage. The child matures but perishes from the shame.
The child decided to remain with their own kin.
By the will of stone and metal, your dwarven child proved to be a prodigy and has become one of the youngest smiths, especially for one raised away from dwarven cities.

Adventure.name: GroupSpiritAttack
Adventure.nodes: You suddenly feel the winds of mystical powers surround you and you know you are caught in some ritual!
You fail. Your mind feels muddled and your spirit cursed.

Adventure.name: OrcChildGrowingup
Adventure.nodes:
Your orc child is about to become an adult. As such, they will undergo the croppings: a coming-of-age ceremony.
But the path is never easy. You must now choose what journey the young one will take before, gods willing, they may return to you as an adult.

The orc clan accepts the child for the trials of fire.
[To pursue rare classes, the child will often need a high stat in the appropriate field (exact numbers vary) like strength for warriors etc. as well as chance. Improving the luck attribute may also help in this.]
The child is ruthless and stealthy. It becomes a bloodtracker.
The orcs deem your child useless, but the youth grows into a skilled crafter.
The trials to become a worker are often the safest, but for an orc child this may not be an easy path to accept.
The orc resented you teaching them to become a mere worker, they left to search for orc clans and likely died doing it.
The orc child learns to become a worker, but they seem to resent you for it.
The orc child learns to become a worker, but they seem to resent you for it.
The trials for a fighter are tough and dangerous. The child must prove their mantle in the wild and hold its own against stronger challengers.
The orc child proves their worth as a warrior, but their path was difficult and left scars.

The child does not do well in their trials. They return to you ragged and depressed, whispering of blood and rape.
They become a labourer, but even in that they remain weak.
The harsh trials of the fighter claimed the life of the youth!
Your child is no mere orc, she is a matriarch! But despite this honour she chose to come back to the path of the cosmic tree.
The orc child proves their worth as a bloodtracker, but their path was difficult and left scars.
The orc child proves their worth as a witch.
Darkness claimed the soul of your child and the youth perished soon after.
Darkness claimed the soul of your child and they return to you as wraith.
The orc child proves their worth as a warrior.
The orc child proves their worth as a bloodtracker.
The child is ruthless and powerfull, it becomes a slugger.
The girl failed to prove her worth and the trials claimed her life!
The child is accepted into the clan and does not return to yours.
The orc child proves their worth as a witch, but her journey was not easy and left many scars.

Adventure.name: Nest Generic All
Adventure.nodes: You find the nesting ground of the creatures roaming this land.
The nest is cleared and so you should have some peace, for now.
You were badly beaten and forced to flee.

Adventure.name: Nest Beast
Adventure.nodes: You find a beast lair.
The nest is cleared and so you should have some peace, for now.
You were badly beaten and forced to flee.
The beasts abandon their lair, so you should have some peace now.

Adventure.name: Nest Unliving
Adventure.nodes: You find a haunted lair, filled with the roaming unliving.
The unliving are destroyed and so you should have some peace, for now.
You were badly beaten and forced to flee.

Adventure.name: Nest Demon
Adventure.nodes: You find a demon nest, which in itself is an oddity. Clearly something drives these demons to congregate here and roam the territory.
The nest lies destroyed and so you should have some peace, for now.
You were badly beaten and forced to flee.
They do not answer, as if enthralled by some spell. But your words give them pause and they abandon this nest in silence.

Adventure.name: GoblinChildGrowingup
Adventure.nodes:
Your goblin child is about to become adult and so it is time to discover their spiritual path.
You must now choose what journey the young one will take before, gods willing, they may return to you as an adult.

A goblin tribe accepts you and the child and agrees for a spirit walk to establish the young ones true path.
[To pursue rare classes, the child will often need a high stat in the appropriate field (exact numbers vary) like strength for warriors etc. as well as chance. Improving the luck attribute may also help in this.]
The child is trained as beastmaster.
The child is accepted into the goblin tribe and does not return to yours.
The trials to become a worker are often the safest and goblins have an affinity for tinkering.
The child does not have a particular aptitude, their path lies in the free roaming journey of a gatherer.
The child finds its fate in tinkering, they will learn craft.
The trials for a fighter are tough and dangerous. The goblin child must prove their mantle and learn to use their size as an advantage and not a handicap.
The child proves their worth as a skirmisher.

The child does not do well in their trials. They return to you rugged and depressed, whispering of blood and rape.
They do become skirmisher, but even in that they remain weak.
The harsh trials of the fighter claimed the life of the youth!
The child proves their worth as a beast master.
The child enters the greyworld, where the spirits reside and returns to you a shaman. The journey, however, was not without its perils and the youth's soul remains tainted.
Darkness claimed the soul of your child and the youth perished soon after.
The spirit world proved too tempting and they return to you as a phantom.
The child proves their worth as a boar rider.
The child enters the greyworld, where the spirits reside, and although the journey was tough, they return to you a shaman.
The child fails to follow the path you laid out for them and becomes a gatherer instead.
The child is trained as a boar rider.
The child is actually not a goblin, it is an orc, and only an adolescent still. Must have been the green skin that confused things. The spirit cave spits them out, luckily without harm.
The forefathers deemed the child's nature fickle and changed them into a forest fairy!
The forefathers in the spirit cave deemed the goblin child's life as theirs.
The forefathers deemed the child's nature fickle and dark and changed them into a bog bies!
The forefathers deemed the child's nature fickle and dark and changed them into a czort!
The forefathers deemed the child's nature fickle and changed them into a hohlick!
The child is trained as a fighter.
The spirit world proved too tempting and they return to you as a phantom.

Adventure.name: TownTrader
Adventure.nodes: Your trading post has attracted your first visitors.
An elven trader offers their wares.
A dwarven trader offers their wares.
An orc trader offers their wares.
A goblin trader offers their wares.
A Slavyan trader offers their wares.

Adventure.name: SlavyanTradeadv
Adventure.nodes: The trader's stalls stand open for you.
'You are no friends of ours, so we won't take food as payment, and you'll have to pay us extra first.'
'Good trading with you. Gods be with you.'

Adventure.name: AlphaclansTradeadv
Adventure.nodes: The trader's stalls stand open for you.
'You are no friends of ours, so we won't take food as payment and you'll have to pay us extra first.'
'Good trading. Now go, fight your enemies!'

Adventure.name: EarthboundTradeadv
Adventure.nodes: The trader's stalls stand open for you.
'You are no friends of ours, so we won't take food as payment and you'll have to pay us extra first.'
'Good trading with ya. May your fires never die.'

Adventure.name: SpirittalkersTradeadv
Adventure.nodes: The trader's stalls stand open for you.
'You are no friends of ours, so you'll have to pay us extra first.'
'Good trading with you. Spirits be with you.'

Adventure.name: WoodlandKinTradeadv
Adventure.nodes: The trader's stalls stand open for you.
'We are not yet befriended; thus, we will not offer good terms, but you may trade.'
'Good trading with you. May nature bless you.'

Adventure.name: TownTrader2
Adventure.nodes: Your trading post has attracted some more visitors.
An elven trader offers their wares.
A dwarven trader offers their wares.
An orc trader offers their wares.
A goblin trader offers their wares.
A Slavyan trader offers their wares.

Adventure.name: Childgrowingup__
Adventure.nodes:
The traumatic events of the last few days made it clear your child is child no more. They now face the time of the croppings, the rite of passage into adulthood.
But this path is never easy. You must now choose what journey the young one will take before, gods willing, they may return to you as an adult.
The trials for a fighter are tough and dangerous. The child must prove their mantle in the wild and hold its own against stronger challengers.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud ranks of the warrior caste.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud ranks of the warrior caste.
The child failed its trials and risks grave danger.
The journey of the hunter is dark and filled with danger lurking at every corner.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud ranks of the hunters.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud ranks of the hunters.
The path the zerca is a spiritual one. There are few physical dangers, yet the chance of success is slim without proper training.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud calling of the zerca.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud calling of the zerca.
The child perished.
The child was lost for many months. In time they return to you, changed - rugged and sick with the ailments of the cursed scavengers.
The trials for a bandit are tough and dangerous. The child must prove their mantle among the ruffians of this world and find the guts to return to you afterwards.
The child failed its trials and risks grave danger.
The child is youth no more, today they join the dubious ranks of banditry.
The child is youth no more, today they join the dubious ranks of banditry...
The child begun to train to be a bandit, but they died horribly at the hands of the ruffians.
The child failed its trials and the consequences can often be dire for such a young mind.
The youth was so depressed by their failure, they wandered off and never returned.
The child could not become what they were meant to, but they showed great skill as a gatherer instead.

The child is shamed by its failure and never amounts to much in their life.
They do however procreate with a goblin and leave their progeny for your care.
The path of craftsmanship is not filled with physical danger, but it is a gruelling and demanding path still.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud profession of craftsmanship.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud profession of craftsmanship.
The child failed their trials and the consequences can often be dire for such a young mind.
The path of gatherers is not filled with physical danger, but it is a gruelling and demanding path still.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud profession of the gatherers.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud profession of the gatherers.
The path of fate is ever spinning in chaos. The child is sent away into darkness and from it they will emerge anew.

Your child was actually a changeling!
It has now grown into a demon, but they are just as loyal to you and your gods as before.

Your child was actually a changeling!
It has now grown into a demon, but they are just as loyal to you and your gods as before.

Your child was actually a changeling, or rather, it was cursed to live under a false form.
Upon the path of fate their true visage returned, but they are ever loyal to your cause and kin.

Alas, your child walked the path of fate and fate did not have good things in store.
They do not speak of what befell them, but they return weakened and depressed but also accompanied by a rat friend.

Your child was actually a changeling, or rather, it was cursed to live under a false form.
Upon the path of fate their true visage returned, but they are ever loyal to your cause and kin.
The young witch must enter the greyworld and seek her destiny within.
The child is youth no more, today they join the dark path of witchery.
The child is youth no more, today they join the dark path of witchery.
The child strays and the greyworld strips their flesh away leaving only an angry spirit. Still, they return to you.
The child is youth no more, today they join the dark path of witchery, but not without paying great price for the dark arts.
The path the healer is not physically challenging, yet not many have the wisdom or persistence to succeed.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud calling of the healer and thanks to the path of Harmony, fate smiles at them on this day.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud calling of the healer.
Your child was gifted in magic, alas, a jealous witch found it and cursed it to live as a rat!
The child is youth no more, today they join the dark path of witchery.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud calling of the zerca.
The child begun to train to be a bandit, but they never did return to the flock.
The youth was so depressed by their failure, they wandered off and never returned.
The child perished.
The child is youth no more, today they join the dubious ranks of banditry...
The young witch must enter the greyworld and seek her destiny within.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud calling of the healer.
The path the zerca is a spiritual one. There are few physical dangers, yet the chance of success is slim without proper training.
The trials for a bandit are tough and dangerous. The child must prove their mantle among the ruffians of this world and find the guts to return to you afterwards.
The path of fate is ever spinning in chaos. The child is sent away into the forest and from it they will emerge anew.

Nature transformed your child into a forest demon.
But they are just as loyal to you and your gods as before.

Nature transformed your child into a forest demon.
But they are just as loyal to you and your gods as before.

Nature transformed your child into a forest demon.
But they are just as loyal to you and your gods as before.

Nature did not transform your child into its demon, instead they will now walk the path of beast.
But they are just as loyal to you and your gods as before.
The child is youth no more, today they join the proud profession of craftsmanship and because you chose the path of Light, they are more skilled than usual.
Your child was gifted in magic, alas, a jealous witch found it and cursed it to live as a spider!
